body_html:
You can reproduce the tests we run with tools/ci_build/ci_sanity.sh tools/ci_build/ci_parameterized_build.sh. Jenkins just runs those with different environment variables set. We definitely should document it better for contributors, though.

Jenkins, test this please

body:
